page.title: 15TIME CAPSULES IN HOOK
page.content: A time capsule is a strong waterproof box containing items of interest about things at a particular time which is then buried for say 5 years.In my plastic bag,inside an ice cream box,I put a tape of my voice and one of this week's Top Twenty,some writing about myself,such as height,measurements, hand and foot prints.I wrote about my main hobbies and interests and about all the changes taking place in{Hook. I put in other things such as copies of the Gazette and Hart Observer, a list of my best friends and a map of present day{Hook.}Lots of people have done the same as me so there are bound to be boxes buried all over the place which some will forget for ever.Where I buried my box is my secret otherwise it wont be there in 1990 when I will open it.I hope some new houses or a road are not built on my treasures.
